verses.1: Israelʼ tapate: Reuben, Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issakhar, Zebulun,
verses.2: Dan, Josef, Benjamin, Naftali, Gad le Asher ahi uh hi.
verses.3: Judahʼ tapate: Er, Onan le Shelah ahi uh hi. Hih thumte pen Kanaan mi Bathshua tawh a neih ahi hi. Judahʼ tacil Er pen Topaʼ muhna ah gamtat hoih lo ahih manin Topa in amah that hi.
verses.4: A tapaʼ zi Tamar in zong amah tawh Perez le Zerah nei hi. Judah in a vekpi-in tapa nga nei hi.
verses.5: Perezʼ tapate: Hezron le Hamul ahi uh hi.
verses.6: Zerahʼ tapate: Zimri, Ethan, Heman, Kalkol le Dara, a vekpi-in nga pha uh hi.
verses.7: Karmiʼ tapa: A ki-ap nate ah a khial, Israel mite a nawngkaisak Akhan ahi hi.
verses.8: Tua ciangin Ethanʼ tapa Azariah ahi hi.
verses.9: Ama sung panin a suak Hezronʼ tapate: Jerahmeel, Ram le Khelubai ahi uh hi.
verses.10: Ram pen Amminadabʼ pa hi a, Amminadab pen Judahʼ tapateʼ sung pan ulian Nahshonʼ pa ahi hi.
verses.11: Nahshon pen Salmaʼ pa, Salma pen Boazʼ pa,
verses.12: Boaz pen Obedʼ pa, Obed pen Jessiʼ pa ahi hi.
verses.13: Jessi in a tacil Eliab, a nihna Abinadab, a thumna Shimea,
verses.14: a lina Nethanel, a ngana Raddai,
verses.15: a gukna Ozem, a sagihna David a nei hi.
verses.16: Amauʼ sanggam numeite Zeruiah le Abigail ahi uh hi. Zeruiahʼ tapate: Abishai, Joab le Asahel, thum pha uh hi.
verses.17: Abigail in Amasa nei a, Amasaʼ pa pen Ishmael mi Jether ahi hi.
verses.18: Hezronʼ tapa Kaleb in a zi Azubah le Jerioth tawh ta nei hi. Ama tate: Jesher, Shobab le Ardon ahi uh hi.
verses.19: Azubah a sih ciangin Kaleb in Efrath teen pihin, tua nu in amah tawh Hur nei hi.
verses.20: Hur pen Uriʼ pa hi a, Uri pen Bezalelʼ pa ahi hi.
verses.21: Ama khan kum sawm guk a phak ciangin Hezron in a teenpih, Gileadʼ pa Makhirʼ tanu luppih hi. Tua nu in amah tawh Segub nei hi.
verses.22: Segub pen Jairʼ pa hi a, Gilead gam sungah khuapi sawm nih le thum nei hi.
verses.23: Ahih hangin Geshur le Aram in amaute tung panin Havvoth jair khua le Kenath le a khuaneute, khua sawm guk la hi. Hihte khempeuh pen Gileadʼ pa Makhirʼ suanlekhakte ahi uh hi.
verses.24: Hezron a sih khit ciangin Kaleb in a pa Hezronʼ zi Efrath luppih a, tua nu in amah tawh Tekoa khuapi a sat Ashhur a nei hi.
verses.25: Hezronʼ tacil Jerahmeelʼ tapate: A tacil Ram, Bunah, Oren le Ahijah ahi uh hi.
verses.26: Jerahmeel in zi dang khat zong nei a, a min Atarah ahi hi. Amah pen Onamʼ nu ahi hi.
verses.27: Jerahmeelʼ tacil Ramʼ tapate: Maaz, Jamin le Eker ahi uh hi.
verses.28: Onamʼ tapate: Shammai le Jada ahi uh hi. Shammaiʼ tapate: Nadab le Abishur ahi uh hi.
verses.29: Abishurʼ ziʼ min Abihail hi a, tua nu in amah tawh Ahban le Molid nei hi.
verses.30: Nadabʼ tapate: Seled le Appaim ahi uh hi. Seled in ta nei loin si hi.
verses.31: Appaimʼ tapa Ishi ahi hi. Ishiʼ tapa Sheshan ahi hi. Sheshanʼ tapa Ahlai ahi hi.
verses.32: Tua ciangin Shammaiʼ sanggampa Jadaʼ tapate: Jether le Jonathan ahi uh hi. Jether in ta nei loin si hi.
verses.33: Jonathanʼ tapate: Peleth le Zaza ahi uh hi. Hihte pen Jerahmeelʼ suanlekhakte ahi uh hi.
verses.34: Sheshan in tapa nei loin tanu bek nei hi. Ahih hangin Sheshan in Jarha min nei Egypt sila khat nei hi.
verses.35: Tua ahih ciangin Sheshan in a sila Jarha tungah a zi dingin a tanu pia a, tua nu in Attai nei hi.
verses.36: Attai pen Nathanʼ pa hi a, Nathan pen Zabadʼ pa ahi hi.
verses.37: Zabad pen Eflalʼ pa hi a, Eflal pen Obedʼ pa ahi hi.
verses.38: Obed pen Jehuʼ pa hi a, Jehu pen Azariahʼ pa ahi hi.
verses.39: Azariah pen Helezʼ pa hi a, Helez pen Eleasahʼ pa ahi hi.
verses.40: Eleasah pen Sismaiʼ pa hi a, Sismai pen Shallumʼ pa ahi hi.
verses.41: Shallum pen Jekamiahʼ pa hi a, Jekamiah pen Elishamaʼ pa ahi hi.
verses.42: Jerahmeelʼ sanggampa Kalebʼ tapa: Zifʼ pa ahi a tacil Mareshah ahi hi. Mareshahʼ tapa Hebron ahi hi.
verses.43: Hebronʼ tapate: Korah, Tappuah, Rekem le Shema ahi uh hi.
verses.44: Shema pen Rahamʼ pa hi a, Raham pen Jorkeamʼ pa ahi hi. Rekem pen Shemaʼ sanggam hi a, Shammaiʼ pa ahi hi.
verses.45: Shammaiʼ tapa Maon hi a, Maon pen Bethzurʼ pa ahi hi.
verses.46: Kalebʼ zineu Efah in Haran, Moza le Gazez nei a, Haran in Gazez kici tapa khat nei hi.
verses.47: Jahdaiʼ tapate: Regem, Jotham, Geshan, Pelet, Efah le Shaaf ahi uh hi.
verses.48: Kalebʼ zineu Maakah in Sheber le Tirhanah nei hi.
verses.49: Tua ciangin tapa nih nei leuleu a, Madmannah khuapi a sat Shaaf le Makbenah khuapi le Gibea khuapi a sat Sheva ahi uh hi. Kaleb in tanu khat zong nei a, a min Aksah ahi hi.
verses.50: Hih a nuai-ate zong Kalebʼ suanlekhakte ahi uh hi. Kalebʼ zi Efrathʼ tacil Hurʼ tapate: Kiriath-jearim khuapi a sat Shobal,
verses.51: Bethlehem khuapi a sat Shalma le Beth-gader khuapi a sat Haref ahi uh hi.
verses.52: Kiriath-jearim khuapi a sat Shobal in tapa nei hi: Haroeh mite le Menuhoth gam a mi a langteʼ pianna ahi hi.
verses.53: Tua ciangin Kiriath-jearim khua sungah a teengte: Ithri mite, Puth mite, Shumath mite le Mishrai mite ahi uh hi. Hihte sung panin Zorah mite le Eshtaol mite hong piang hi.
verses.54: Bethlehem khuapi a sat Salmaʼ suante: Netofah mite, Atroth-beth-joab mite le Zorah mi ahi Manahath minam nih sung pan alang ahi hi.
verses.55: Jabez ah a teeng lai thei minamte: Tirath mite, Shimeath mite le Sukath mite ahi uh hi. Hihte pen Rekhab minamte tawh a kiteeng Ken mite ahi uh hi.
